text: Motion
Motion

Ah!
Producer!
Oh, Meguru.

Hey there!
Producer, are you headed to the office now?

Yeah,
Are you coming too?

Yeah!
Can I come with you?
Of course!
Thanks!
Producer, are you coming back from work?

Yeah, that's right.
Just a bit of, sales.
Sales! A businessman!
Cool!
Haha, thank you.
Oh, you think it's just flattery, right?
Oh, you must think I'm flattering you!

I'm glad to hear you say it's cool when I'm
trying to be helpful to Meguru.
Hehe, I see!
Well then, I bet the snacks will be delicious today.
since you worked hard!
That's right.

I saw what Hazuki-san put in the fridge when I was leaving,
but I didn't ask about it.
Is that so!

Mano and Hiori said they already ate them.
It was Hazuki-san's recommendation!
Ah, the Illumine group chat, huh?
Yep!

She said to check it out for ourselves,
so I have no idea what they're like!

I see, so it'll be
a surprise when we get to the office!
Exactly!
I'm really looking forward to it!

It might be first come, first served,
or maybe there will be various types!

If there are various types,
I might be torn on which one to choose!
Right.

While we're deciding, someone might come
and snatch them away...! Just kidding!

Hehe, if we both wanted the same one,
we could play rock-paper-scissors!
There might not be just one type per person.
That's true!

If that's the case, saying "it's delicious together!"
would make it even more delicious!
Hmm, it's starting to sound exciting!
Meguru?
If it's first come, first served, we might not be able to win!

So, Producer!
Let's hurry up and go!
